abstract: The same day that Carl C. Icahn won the backing of the influential proxy adviser Institutional Shareholders Services in his fight to gain a seat on Motorola‘s board, the cell phone maker got an ally of its own.
lead_paragraph: The same day that Carl C. Icahn won the backing of the influential proxy adviser Institutional Shareholders Services in his fight to gain a seat on Motorola‘s board, the cell phone maker got an ally of its own.

headline.main: Proxy Firms Square Off in Icahn’s Fight for Motorola Seat
